DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomized controlled trial is to examine the impact of a patient decision aid on the quality of decisions about managing symptoms of depression. In particular, we will examine whether the decision aid increases knowledge about depression/managing depression symptoms and concordance between goals and treatment choices.
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Quality of Decisions About Treatment of Depression
DOC.criteria: Aged 18+ In the last 12 months, talked to a health care provider about starting or stopping a treatment (prescription medicine for depression or counseling)
